results.title: Old and new
results.brief_description: In her house Karen Adams is surrounded by old and new things. Objects that she finds in op shops and on the beach. Things that remind her of home. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.
results.description: In her house Karen Adams is surrounded by old and new things. Objects that she finds in op shops and on the beach. Things that remind her of home. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.

results.title: A Fishy problem
results.creator_credit: Astrid Silberman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Astrid Silberman attempts to recreate her family recipe for Gefilte fish. She has trouble deciding whether to follow the traditional recipe or to come up with a new interpretation on the old tradition. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.

results.creator_credit: Jenni Klempfner, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Jenni Klempfner explores her ancestors’ Polish and Jewish heritage as well as her own multi-cultural family. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.

results.title: D-Day
results.creator_credit: Darryl Jordan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Darryl Jordan and his partner prepare their home for the encroaching bushfires. The wait for D-day is all-consuming for this family. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.

results.title: Stars in his eyes
results.brief_description: Marianne Guetta knows when her husband John tells her he has a plan, he’s thinking big! Over the years he helped organize the Sunbury rock festival, was the lighting director for channel nine on various major telecasts and is now planning to build an observatory and planetarium.
results.description: Marianne Guetta knows when her husband John tells her he has a plan, he’s thinking big! results.title: The Affliction of Memory
results.creator_credit: Zeina Zogheib, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: For Zeina Zogheib the aroma of coffee and the fragrant scent of gardenia bring memories of Lebanon flooding back. A place Zeina and her family fled, due to the ravages of war.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Zeina Zogheib, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Loving Lebanon and Australia
results.creator_credit: Sam Haddad, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Lebanese immigrant Sam Haddad migrated to Australia he encountered ignorance and racism but via a well timed punch, he learned the value of mateship and tolerance and began to love his adopted country.
